body:
It's not far off a year since I put this website together for the awesome team at Nectar Beverages. It's custom built and handcrafted to match the sweet branding they have put together and it was really fun to be part of the ride. :)

Check out the website at [nectarbeverages.co.nz](https://www.nectarbeverages.co.nz)

They're pretty well stocked in Clevedon, Maraetai, Beachlands and the North Shore, if you happen to see one, make sure you try it out!

If you're after a hand crafted and customized website, get in touch with us [here](www.icraft.co.nz/contact-us)
summary: A little bit about creating one of the first websites under ICRAFT
title: One of ICRAFT's first websites
